name: bozit-create-any-storage-sas-token
description: Create a SAS Token for any storage account type.
author: PrayerShare

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: StorageAccountRM
inputs.label: RM Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a pre-existing ARM storage account.

inputs.name: SasTokenTimeStartInHours
inputs.label: SasToken TimeStart In Hours
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the number of hours the token is valid from prior to the build server's time, default 1h prior.

inputs.name: SasTokenTimeOutInHours
inputs.label: SasToken TimeOut In Hours
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the number of hours the token is valid.

inputs.name: SasHttpsProtocol
inputs.label: SasToken HTTPS Protocol Setting
inputs.helpMarkDown: Un-check this option if you want SAS Token access via non-HTTPS.

inputs.name: Permission
inputs.label: Permission
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the rights that the token should has (rwdl) which stands for read write delete list.

inputs.name: StorageContainerName
inputs.label: Storage Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name of an existing Storage container within the given StorageAccount.

inputs.name: outputStorageUri
inputs.label: Storage Container URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name (without $() ) for the variable for the storage container URI that the files were copied to with this task. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the resource group in subsequent tasks like in the DeployAzureResourceGroup task for deploying ARM Templates. Valid only when the selected destination is Azure Blob.

inputs.name: outputStorageContainerSasToken
inputs.label: Storage Container SAS Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name (without $() ) for the variable for the storage container SAS Token used to access the files copied to with this task. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the resource group in subsequent tasks like in the DeployAzureResourceGroup task for deploying ARM Templates. Valid only when the selected destination is Azure Blob.

instanceNameFormat: Create SAS Token for Storage Account $(StorageAccountRM)
